posts.post_content:
Turn 1: [Slagwurm Armor](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Slagwurm Armor)  
Turn 2: [Tidehollow Strix](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Tidehollow Strix)  
Turn 3: Equipt  
Turn 4: Laugh  
Turn 5: [Mind Funeral](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mind Funeral)  
  
Lots of possibilities, and goes great in my blue mill deck that splashes black (for [Tidehollow Strix](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Tidehollow Strix), [Mind Funeral](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mind Funeral), [Glimpse the Unthinkable](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Glimpse the Unthinkable), et cetera) and white (for [Path to Exile](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Path to Exile)d [Archive Trap](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Archive Trap) fun, [Wall of Denial](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Wall of Denial) stalling, [Deft Duelist](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Deft Duelist), et cetera).  
  
Er... I over parenthize things... Gotta stay on topic... :/  
  
But yeah, giving it some added defence forces gives it some staying power, and a flying deathtoucher for 2 can only even be rivaled by something else like a flying lifelink deathtouch for 3 ([Vampire Nighthawk](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vampire Nighthawk)) or a first striker with shroud for 2 (the afformentioned [Deft Duelist](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Deft Duelist)).  
  
A cool card to use, lots of flavor IMO. And being com... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)

posts.post_content: The 2/1 stats are great for getting in early beats, and most of the time it is unblockable. This guy acts as a removal sink as well, since he's annoying to deal with otherwise.

posts.post_content:
This is a strong creature for any U/B deck. At a CC of just 2, it gives you a strong creature on both offense and defense.
  
   
Toss him and the [Esper Stormblade](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Esper Stormblade) into a deck together for an aerial \*\*\*ault force that can dish out some damage.
  
   
4/5

Rating:

posts.post_content: Plays aggro and defense, kind of like Jund stand-bys [Putrid Leech](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Putrid Leech) and [Sprouting Thrinax](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sprouting Thrinax). Unfortunately, significantly less staying power, and many of the bigger creatures you might hope to kill are effectively immune to Strix's deathtouch-[Baneslayer Angel](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Baneslayer Angel), [Gideon Jura](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Gideon Jura) etc. Foiled by a single soldier or bird token. Still, he's only CC 2...
